folder: Manhattan : 6th Avenue & Sullivan Street & Broome Street., Manhattan, NY
text:
(1) and (2)
Sixth Avenue and Sullivan Street, north from Broome Street. The former is thru the center and the Butterick Building fronts on same at Spring Street. This structure bears No. 161 Sixth Avenue. Buildings at the left are included with this thoroughfare tho previously they faced on the now obliterated Clark Street. To the right appears an extensive view up Sullivan Street. The C.G. Hussey & Co. occupy the two-story building, No. 140-8 Sixth Avenue.
F5 - Neg: 2724
P. L. Sperr
F6 - Neg: 2719
July 25, 1939
Views 1, 2

(3)
A similar view to No. 2. The cleared land in the foreground is a triangular plot separating the Avenue from Sullivan Street.
View 3: June 27, 1932
F-7 Neg: 2720
P. L. Sperr
title: Manhattan : 6th Avenue - Sullivan Street - Broome Street.
